alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Northwest Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 29 at 3:45AM EST until December 30 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Total snow accumulation of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Northeast Aroostook and Northwest Aroostook Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Expect slippery roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.
